parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From phusis in the primary sense of blowing; to inflate, i.e. make proud.
By no means, not at all. Intensive of ou; not indeed.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To mourn, lament, feel guilt. From penthos; to grieve.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Middle, in the middle, between, in the midst of. From meta; middle (neuter) noun).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
